entry.title: Plans for Year 2016
entry.content:
2016 is near by and this is the best time to plan for 2016.

My plans for Year 2016

  • Stay healthy, fit and in shape
  • Complete the 10-day Vipassana Meditation programme
  • Get strong abs
  • Develop a habit pattern to learn things faster
  • Develop a habit pattern to stay consistent
  • Get productive
  • Note down and keep track of every task, work and blog about it online
  • Create video tutorials for Develop2Deploy
  • Organize quality Meetup events for students/freshers
  • Become a better programmer
  • Become more better at C# and MVC
  • Continue podcasting where I left it in 2015
  • Market about Develop2Deploy and reach out to more students and freshers
  • Visit Isha Yoga Center, Coimbatore
  • Blog more often on my blog
  • Interview technical experts on my podcast show
  • Review more technical books
  • Organize free online webinars for students and freshers
  • Create free and premium video tutorials for Orchard Beginner
  • Contribute more to Orchard CMS Documentation
